identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.mission: Create a healthcare interface that balances clinical authority with radical human empathy. Avoid the 'sterile hospital' look; aim for 'high-end wellness clinic'.
principles: Visuals: High-contrast typography, soft shadows, generous whitespace

heading.usage: Use for all section headers, modal titles, and hero text. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for all paragraphs, inputs, and chat messages. Relaxed leading (1.6).

mono.usage: Use ONLY for medical codes (ICD-10), reference numbers, or dosage data.

colors.description: A sophisticated blend of deep teal (authority) and soft sage (calm), punctuated by warm coral (humanity).

layout.spacing_strategy: Generous. Use p-8 or p-12 for containers. Avoid cramped interfaces.

grid_system.marketing: Bento Grid (Mode A). Asymmetric layouts for features.
grid_system.dashboard: Control Room (Mode B). Dense but soft. Use 'gap-6'.
grid_system.chat: Floating Island. The chat container should float in the center with max-width-2xl.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-300

cards.style: Clean, white, soft shadow. No heavy borders.
cards.classes: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-2xl shadow-sm border border-border/50 hover:shadow-md transition-all

inputs.classes: h-12 rounded-xl border-border/80 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 bg-background

glassmorphism.usage: Use for sticky headers and floating action buttons.

gradients.usage: Subtle background blobs only. NO text gradients.

shadows.usage: Soft, diffuse shadows. Avoid harsh black shadows.

icons.usage: Use for navigation, features, and status indicators.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE CSS VARIABLES: Copy the 'css_variables' section into /app/frontend/src/index.css immediately.
2. INSTALL FONTS: Add Manrope and Public Sans via Google Fonts import in index.css.
3. LANDING PAGE: Build a 'Trust-First' landing page. Hero section must use the 'hero_doctor' image with a soft gradient overlay.
4. CHAT INTERFACE: This is the core. It must feel like a premium messaging app (like iMessage or WhatsApp) but cleaner. Use the 'chat_bubbles' styles defined above.
5. DASHBOARD: Use the 'Control Room' grid. Show 'Upcoming Appointments', 'Recent Symptoms', and 'Health Score' as key widgets.
6. AUTH PAGES: Keep them simple. Split screen: Left side form, Right side 'lab_abstract' image.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to ALL interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
